channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Second pothole on Cowper Road outside number 11 driveway entrance, 20th February
item.description:
Second pothole outside number 11 driveway entrance. Expanding due to water filling and not drying up or draining. Present for at least a couple of months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Cowper Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Outside 78 Hewlett Road, opposite St Anne's Road junction

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose manhole cover very noisy when vehicles pass over, 20th February
item.description:
A manhole cover is loose (slightly further down from the other report) and very noisy when vehicles pass over. There’s a report of another loose cover further up the road, but it appears to be this one making the noise. Many thanks, Tom

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103, Shurdington Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large pot holes when coming downhill by Pilgrove cottage, 20th February
item.description:
2 potholes on the RH carriageway when travelling from Cheltenham towards Staverton. When driving up the hill past the new houses at Old Mill road. In the area just past the telegraph pole with reflective strips (RHS) up to the next telegraph pole with a red marker sign next to it (by Pilgrove cottage hedge).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near the centre of the road, 19th February
item.description:
Just past the bus stop coming from Charlton kings in the middle of the road. Really deep and has actually punched my tyre when I didn't see it late last night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 massive pot holes, 19th February
item.description:
2 massive pot holes on the corner of harp hill. Due to on coming traffic I was unable to swerve causing my tire to get stredded and my car to be recovered . Much bigger then the guide lines off “tennis ball”

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
